label: RELATES_TO
description: General, unspecified association between entities

label: HAS
description: A possesses or contains B

label: PART_OF
description: A is a component or member of B

label: BELONGS_TO
description: A belongs to or is owned by B

label: CREATED
description: A created or brought B into existence

label: DERIVED_FROM
description: B is derived or copied from A

label: AUTHORED
description: A authored or wrote B (document, work)

label: KNOWS
description: A is acquainted with or aware of B

label: FRIEND_OF
description: A is socially connected to B as a friend

label: WORKS_FOR
description: A is employed by or contracted to B

label: MANAGES
description: A supervises or manages B

label: MEMBER_OF
description: A is a member of group or organization B

label: LOCATED_IN
description: A location is within B (geographical or logical)

label: ORIGINATES_FROM
description: A place or source of origin is B

label: FOLLOWS
description: A subscribes to updates from B

label: REFERENCES
description: A refers to or cites B

label: CITES
description: A bibliographically cites B

label: DEPENDS_ON
description: A requires B to function or build

label: SYNONYM_OF
description: A is an alternative name for B

label: TRANSLATION_OF
description: A is a translation of B
